test_message: Analyze operating expenses: CEO salary $250k, one-time legal settlement $50k, personal auto lease $14.4k, R&D costs $120k. Calculate normalized EBITDA adjustments.

addback_categories.description: Non-recurring legal expense for settlement unrelated to ongoing business operations.
addback_categories.rationale: This legal expense is considered non-recurring and unrelated to ongoing operations. Excluding it provides a clearer view of sustainable EBITDA.

addback_categories.description: Personal auto lease paid by company for CEO.
addback_categories.rationale: The auto lease is a personal expense and not required for business operations. Removing it aligns EBITDA with core business profitability.
addback_categories.supporting_evidence: Vehicle lease agreement and expense policy comparison.

red_flags: Potential overcompensation: CEO salary requires market benchmarking for owner compensation adjustment.
R&D cost add-back not justified unless proven non-recurring or not core to business.

recommendations: Benchmark CEO salary against market to determine if an owner compensation adjustment is warranted.
Provide clear documentation supporting non-recurring nature of the legal settlement.
Review other expense categories for further personal or non-recurring items.
